web-development.name: Ecommerce app
web-development.techUsed: MongoDB, Expres.js, React.js, Node.js, Heroku, Git, JWT, Google API, React Router Dom, ContextAPI, etc
web-development.description: Created an ecommerce app using the MERN stack. The source code is in GitHub.

web-development.name: API documentation
web-development.description: Wrote the API documentation in the code. The docs is compiled using JSDocs, and is displayed in the SwaggerUI using Express JS. The API docs follow the OpenAPI 3.0 specification

web-development.name: Contact app
web-development.description: Created a responsive cotnact app using React.js and GraphQL. The source code is in GitHub.

web-development.name: Resume site
web-development.techUsed: React.js, Git, Figma, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Animate, Router-dom, Canva
web-development.description: Created a responsive resume site (this site) using React.js. The source code is in GitHub. Design was made using Figma, following the common UI/UX design patterns. Stored written content in JSON format to mimic NoSQL database.

web-development.name: Interactive Image Gallery
web-development.description: Created an interactive web application using JQuery to update and manipulate the DOM elements. Used Bootstrap for CSS styling.

documentation-developer.description: Update, maintain and create the online help pages to reflect the new features implemented in the development phase. Work with BA’s to understand the User Story.

documentation-developer.techUsed: Madcap flare, HTML, CSS, Git, TFS
documentation-developer.description: Update, maintain and create the release notes in PDF using the docs-as-code approach to reflect the new features implemented in the development phase. Work with BA’s to understand the User Story.

documentation-developer.name: API documentation

documentation-developer.name: Technical blog posts (SEO)

documentation-developer.name: GrowthWheel page
documentation-developer.description: Create new help pages for common customer issues. Also made the roadmap posts that show customer how the new implemented feature works. Watched loom videos made by the Project Manager to understand the feature works.

documentation-developer.name: Server configuration
documentation-developer.description: The original deliverables was a series of markdown files on the following network commands: NGINX, tracert and dig. Then, I used those files to create a documentation site using React.js
